title: All Ball - Duke, Kentucky, Mich. St., Kansas Early Takeaways; Lakers; Fox Hoops Analyst Tim Miles On Small School Success, His Nebraska Exit, TV Transition
itunes:title: All Ball - Duke, Kentucky, Mich. St., Kansas Early Takeaways; Lakers; Fox Hoops Analyst Tim Miles On Small School Success, His Nebraska Exit, TV Transition
description:
This week, Gottlieb gives his takeaways from the Champion's Classic matchups with Kansas, Michigan State, Duke and Kentucky. He also talks with new Fox College Hoops Analyst Tim Miles on transitioning to broadcasting after his Nebraska exit, his desire to get back into coaching, and his path from rural South Dakota to big time college hoops. Make sure you download, rate and subscribe here to get the latest All Ball Podcasts!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
